hambanthota plenti gasamin siti adeshapalanika sathwaya pumba prasaranaya karanu labuye chandraka kumarathunga ha mahinda rajapaksha yana rejimayan wisini.wisheshayen rajapaksha palanaya marwin silwawa ihala usakin osawa thabana ladi.kalaniya aasana sanwidhayaka dhurayen pudanu labu silwage marakam ha jadakam rajapaksha aanduwata rahasak wuye natha.namuth jathiye piyata mema asahanakari pudgalaya kerehi pawathiye guptha premayaki.rupawahini sansthawe sidu wu kuprakata siduwimedi janadhipathi rajapaksha hela daka thibune amathiwarayekuwa prana apayata ganimin karalikari lesa hasiruna sewaka prajawa misa silwawa nowe.ema udghoshanayata sambandha wu madhyawedinge pitawal kapena wita ee pasupasa pawathina hasthaya silwage bawa rajapaksha itha hodin dana sitiyeya.namuth me siyallata ida dena ladi.sirasa aayathanayata maha dawal gal gasuwo paminiye kiribathgodini.eewa sanwidhanaya kalo kawarahuda yanna deshapalana baladhikariya dana siti namudu gath kisidu piyawarak natha.athadanguwata path sakakaruwan eelaga dinaya wana wita polisiya wisinma muda harina ladi.basil rajapaksha mathiwarana raswimakadi pradeshaye "sanwardhana eejanthaya" lesa wareka silwawa abhisheka kaleya.silwa eeta prathi upakara lesa swakiya basil wandanawa basil agamathi wiya yuthuya yana shiksha padaya prasiddhiye samadan wima haraha prakashayata path karana ladi.
sammanayata pathrawima gana hrudayangama subha pathum....

ganwathura thaththwaya hethuwen wipathata path shri lankikayanta sahana salasima sandaha amerika eksath janapada rajaya amerikanu dolar 50000 k shri lankawata parithyaga karayi.shri lanka rathukurusa sangamaya ha aapada kalamanakarana madhyasthanaye illimata anuwa shri lankawe amerikanu eksath janapada thanapathi karyalaya magin me mudala labadena athara awathanwuwanta sahana salasima sandaha me mudala shri lanka rathukurusa sangamayata laba deyi.shri lankawe swabhawika wyasanayak pawathina bawa prakashayata path kirimath samanga antharjathika sanwardhanaya sandaha wu amerikanu aayathanaya mangin me mudala shri lankawata labadena bawa shri lankawe amerika eksath janapada thanapathini patrishiya butenis mahathmiya pawasayi.me mudala prayojanayata ganimin awathan wu pudgalayan sandaha aahara, paniya jalaya, aushadha, redipili, plastik upakarana, tent aadi athyawashya da labadenu atha.
